metadata: (info { (description "Nzengué is a name for alignment games played in the Republic of Congo. This version is played on a larger board, with twelve pieces.") (aliases {"Nzengué (Large)"}) (useFor "Ruleset/Historical Information (Incomplete)" (rules "Square-shaped board. Twelve pieces per player. Players alternate turns placing a piece on the board. Players attempt to line up three of their pieces in a row. Players also move pieces along the lines of the board. ")) (useFor "Ruleset/Historical Information (Incomplete)" (source "DLP evidence.")) (useFor "Ruleset/Historical Information (Incomplete)" (id "1357")) (useFor "Ruleset/Nzengue (Large) (Ludii 1) (Reconstructed)" (rules "The game Nzengue (Large) is played by two players on a square board with concentric tiling. All players play with Markers. Rules for Pieces: Markers step adjacent then if a player places 3 of their pieces in an orthogonal direction line, move again. Players take turns moving. Rules: If in the same turn, remove pieces at not a player places 3 of their pieces in an orthogonal direction line sites occupied by any component owned by Enemy in Board, else from vertex in Player the moving player's hand site 0 to vertex in the set of empty vertexs moveRule: true then if a player places 3 of their pieces in an orthogonal direction line, move again if in the same turn, remove pieces at not a player places 3 of their pieces in an orthogonal direction line sites occupied by any component owned by Enemy in Board, else move one of your pieces. ")) (useFor "Ruleset/Nzengue (Large) (Ludii 1) (Reconstructed)" (id "3149")) (useFor "Ruleset/Nzengue (Large) (Ludii 2) (Reconstructed)" (rules "The game Nzengue (Large) is played by two players on a square board with concentric tiling. All players play with Markers. Rules for Pieces: Markers step adjacent then if a player places 3 of their pieces in an north direction line, a player places 3 of their pieces in an south direction line, a player places 3 of their pieces in an east direction line or a player places 3 of their pieces in an west direction line, move again. Players take turns moving. Rules: If in the same turn, remove pieces at not a player places 3 of their pieces in an orthogonal direction line sites occupied by any component owned by Enemy in Board, else from vertex in Player the moving player's hand site 0 to vertex in the set of empty vertexs moveRule: true then if a player places 3 of their pieces in an orthogonal direction line, move again if in the same turn, remove pieces at not a player places 3 of their pieces in an orthogonal direction line sites occupied by any component owned by Enemy in Board, else move one of your pieces. ")) (useFor "Ruleset/Nzengue (Large) (Ludii 2) (Reconstructed)" (id "3150")) (useFor "Ruleset/Nzengue (Large) (Ludii 3) (Reconstructed)" (rules "The game Nzengue (Large) is played by two players on a square board with concentric tiling. All players play with Markers. Rules for Pieces: Markers step adjacent then if a player places 3 of their pieces in an orthogonal direction line, move again. Players take turns moving. Rules: If in the same turn, remove pieces at not a player places 3 of their pieces in an orthogonal direction line sites occupied by any component owned by Enemy in Board, else from vertex in Player the moving player's hand site 0 to vertex in the set of empty vertexs moveRule: true then if a player places 3 of their pieces in an orthogonal direction line, move again if in the same turn, remove pieces at not a player places 3 of their pieces in an orthogonal direction line sites occupied by any component owned by Enemy in Board, else move one of your pieces. ")) (useFor "Ruleset/Nzengue (Large) (Ludii 3) (Reconstructed)" (id "3151")) (useFor "Ruleset/Nzengue (Large) (Ludii 4) (Reconstructed)" (rules "The game Nzengue (Large) is played by two players on a square board with concentric tiling. All players play with Markers. Rules for Pieces: Markers step adjacent then if a player places 3 of their pieces in an orthogonal direction line, move again. Players take turns moving. Rules: If in the same turn, remove pieces at not a player places 3 of their pieces in an orthogonal direction line sites occupied by any component owned by Enemy in Board, else from vertex in Player the moving player's hand site 0 to vertex in the set of empty vertexs moveRule: true then if a player places 3 of their pieces in an orthogonal direction line, move again if in the same turn, remove pieces at not a player places 3 of their pieces in an orthogonal direction line sites occupied by any component owned by Enemy in Board, else move one of your pieces. ")) (useFor "Ruleset/Nzengue (Large) (Ludii 4) (Reconstructed)" (id "3152")) (useFor "Ruleset/Nzengue (Large) (Ludii 5) (Reconstructed)" (rules "The game Nzengue (Large) is played by two players on a square board with concentric tiling. All players play with Markers. Rules for Pieces: Markers if 3 is equal to the number of pieces owned by Player the moving player, from vertex in the location of the piece to vertex in the set of empty vertexs moveRule: true, else step adjacent. Players take turns moving. Rules: If in the same turn, remove pieces at not a player places 3 of their pieces in an orthogonal direction line sites occupied by any component owned by Enemy in Board, else from vertex in Player the moving player's hand site 0 to vertex in the set of empty vertexs moveRule: true then if a player places 3 of their pieces in an orthogonal direction line, move again if in the same turn, remove pieces at not a player places 3 of their pieces in an orthogonal direction line sites occupied by any component owned by Enemy in Board, else move one of your pieces. ")) (useFor "Ruleset/Nzengue (Large) (Ludii 5) (Reconstructed)" (id "3153")) (useFor "Ruleset/Nzengue (Large) (Ludii 6) (Reconstructed)" (rules "The game Nzengue (Large) is played by two players on a square board with concentric tiling. All players play with Markers. Rules for Pieces: Markers step adjacent then if a player places 3 of their pieces in an north direction line, a player places 3 of their pieces in an south direction line, a player places 3 of their pieces in an east direction line or a player places 3 of their pieces in an west direction line, move again. Players take turns moving. Rules: If in the same turn, remove pieces at not a player places 3 of their pieces in an orthogonal direction line sites occupied by any component owned by Enemy in Board, else from vertex in Player the moving player's hand site 0 to vertex in the set of empty vertexs moveRule: true then if a player places 3 of their pieces in an orthogonal direction line, move again if in the same turn, remove pieces at not a player places 3 of their pieces in an orthogonal direction line sites occupied by any component owned by Enemy in Board, else move one of your pieces. ")) (useFor "Ruleset/Nzengue (Large) (Ludii 6) (Reconstructed)" (id "3154")) (useFor "Ruleset/Nzengue (Large) (Ludii 7) (Reconstructed)" (rules "The game Nzengue (Large) is played by two players on a square board with concentric tiling. Players take turns moving.
